benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/paymentMethods - Add a payment method

covered: POST Method: Valid Payload scenarios cover resource creation with valid payloads (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC06, TC07, TC08, TC10, TC11).
POST Method: Invalid Payload scenarios cover malformed body and missing fields (TC12, TC13, TC19, TC20).
POST Method: Duplicate Submission handling (no duplicates on retry / concurrency) (TC23).
POST Method: Validation coverage (SQL injection in pluginName, XSS in pluginInfo, invalid accountId) (TC19, TC20, TC14).
POST Method: Server Error Handling (400/404/500/503 scenarios) (TC12, TC15, TC16, TC17, TC18, TC27).
recommendations: Add explicit authorization test coverage for POST (beyond missing header and invalid token tests) to ensure proper handling of 401/403 in all POST flows.
Include idempotency tests for repeated POSTs to confirm no duplicates under retry scenarios.
Document and test boundary conditions for payload field sizes and plugin properties to prevent edge-case failures.
